item.description:

potions.java:131: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerXP location: class potions c.playerXP(8000*getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]), 18) ; ^ potions.java:131: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerXP(int,int) location: class client c.playerXP(8000*getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]), 18) ; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.description:
@tztk wrote:

I have no idea how to fix because I don’t code delta but I’m pretty sure the error means that you haven’t defined some of the stuff you put into the code. Once you define it I’m pretty sure it will work.

item.title: [Delta] Potions
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Okay, I’m trying to make a potion give 8k Slayer experience and this is the code I have in potions.java

case 5759: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); c.sM("You drink the Slayer's Respite."); c.deleteItem(5759, slot, 1); c.sM("and gain 8k Slayer experience."); c.addItem(1919, 1); c.addSkillXP(8000*getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]), 18); break;

BUT, I’m getting this error, and I don’t know what I’m missing. :\

potions.java:131: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerXP location: class potions c.addSkillXP(8000*getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]), 18); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Please help!

Read full topic
